abstract: The private equity backers of oil firm Kosmos Energy are considering taking it public in either the U.K. or U.S., which could value the company at around $5 billion, Reuters said, citing a report in The Financial Times Thursday.
snippet: The private equity backers of oil firm Kosmos Energy are considering taking it public in either the U.K. or U.S., which could value the company at around $5 billion, Reuters said, citing a report in The Financial Times Thursday.
lead_paragraph: The private equity backers of the oil firm Kosmos Energy are considering taking it public in either Britain or United States, which could value the company at around $5 billion, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Would a Public Kosmos be Worth $5 Billion?
